title: Ticket #2327: Procd link errors on 64 bit CSL boxes
description:
On the 7.7.1 master, the procd fails to link with duplicate symbols in dprintf and EXCEPT, and missing symbols for classads. This only seems to happen on 64 bit CSL Linux boxes, not NMI, not 32 bit CSL.

Git archeology showed that it is related to the new safe_open library.
check_ins: 2011-Jul-21 14:52   Check-in [22571]: Rename safe_open.c -> safe_open.cpp #2327 This implicitly turns on -O2 optimization, which allows it to link on 64 bit CSL machines. (By Greg Thain )
creator: gthain
